title: Good guys facing bad guys?
detail: If any of your matches do not contain HEEL vs FACE, lose $10

title: Is your main event engaging?
detail: if your main event does not feature HEEL vs FACE, lose $10

title: Boring bad guys
detail: If your matchcard contains a HEEL vs HEEL, lose $15

title: No bad guys?
detail: if your matchcard contains a FACE vs FACE, lose $5

title: Too many good guys?
detail: if you have 3 more FACE than HEEL, lose $10

title: Too many bad guys?
detail: if you have 3 more HEEL than FACE, lose $10

title: Equpment bonus
detail: Free gimmick card

title: Productive writing
detail: Free story card

title: Short term injury
detail: Star from pos 2 will miss next show!

title: Long term injury
detail: Star from pos 3 is removed from your roster

title: Upstaged by undercard?
detail: If a lower card match scores higher than main event, lose $5

title: 5 Star match
detail: your top rated match is very popular, the superstars gain +1

title: Popular story
detail: If you have an active story, double its payoff value

title: Top star
detail: Winner of your main event gets additional +1

title: Loveable loser
detail: Loser of lowest match gets +1

title: Extend story
detail: If an active story, set back to stage 1

title: Too many gimmicks
detail: if over 6 gimmicks played, lose $10

title: Too many TV spots
detail: if over 3 TV spots, lose $10

title: Too many big shows?
detail: If over 2 arena shows, lose $10

title: Too many legends
detail: No space for young guys, if over 2 legend visits, lose $10

title: No champ?
detail: If no champion set, lose $10

title: No big shows?
detail: If no tokens earnt yet, lose $10

title: Free agent
detail: If any available stars, free one added to roster

title: Star quits
detail: A member of your roster leaves after this show and becomes a free agent, you are paid their value

title: Free TV spot
detail: Reward for ratings, you get 1 free TV card

title: Show bonus
detail: Your show is well received, have a bonus $10

title: Where are your roster?
detail: If you have 6 or less on your roster, lose $10

title: No big stars?
detail: If you have no stars of 9 or above, lose $10

title: No stories?
detail: If no active stories, lose $10

title: World Champ interview
detail: The world champ interviews on TV, if yours gain an extra $10
